description: %%dark_gray%%%%italic%%A Factory masterpiece - its divine taste transcends reality, offering a heavenly escape.

description: %%dark_gray%%%%italic%%Crafted in the Factory, its smoothness melts hearts and tastes like a sweet escape.

description: %%gray%%A squishy moist mess.

description: %%gray%%When you pay through the nose, you'll end up with a nosebleed.

description: %%gold%%Gold%%gray%%, but broken into fragments. This makes it important somehow.

An outstanding find. While few are known to exist, even fewer have been successfully retrieved.

name: Plasma
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Stable magnetic field, but handle with caution.

description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A famous Wizard used a wand made out of these.

name: Stew the Fish
description: %%gray%%The stew was expired.

name: Red Thornleaf
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A leaf that grows on the ground. Really pushing the envelope.

name: Blaze Ashes
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Blazes are ephemeral creatures, constantly consuming themselves. Their ashes are said to bring good fortune.

description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Burning passion.

description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A perfectly fine tooth, besides its weight...

description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Shines bright like a fish

name: Hallowed Skull
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Incredibly heavy. Put one on each side of a stick and you just crafted yourself very stylish dumbbells.

name: Corrupted Fragment
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Spreads fast.

name: Poem of True Love
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Filled with poor punctuation and misspellings, but its message is profound.

name: Very Official Yellow Rock of Love!
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A majestic, one-of-a-kind mineral that glistens in the morning sun.

name: Fossil the Fish
description: Older than time itself yet never changing, for he was born %%gray%%%%italic%%perfect%%gray%%.

name: %%green%%Swappable Preview %%gray%%(Click)
description: Cycle between all the variations of the selected preview!

name: Magma Chunk
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%"If Magma Cream is the cement, Magma Chunks are the bricks." - Magma Cube local expert.

name: Sulphur
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%"Give me some Sulphur and I'll make a wand. Give me all the Sulphur and I'll conquer the world." - Unnamed Mage.

name: Secret Gift for Juliette
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A well-wrapped present that's hot to the touch.

name: Moogma Pelt
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The bottom of the volcano is filled with it, Moogmas keep on moulting. It's a problem.

name: Concentrated Stone
description: %%gray%%The purest form of stone. How can something so simple, be so heavy?

name: Odger's Diamond Tooth
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A perfectly fine tooth, besides its radiant brightness...

name: Pioneer Pickaxe
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The very first pickaxe model! Invented by the famous Thomas Pickson.

name: Treasurite
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Origin unknown.

name: Suspicious Stew
description: Comes with a Health Disclaimer: "Expired in the year 87. Do not consume." %%black%%à¶ž

name: Glacite Jewel
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%It is said that there is a lost village made of Glacite, deep under the Dwarven Mines.

name: Sorrow
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%To become a ghost, one must go through unimaginable distress.

name: Lumino Fiber
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Changes color based on the angle you look at it.

name: Starfall
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%No one knows how and when the Starfall appeared. All we know is that it was already there when the Dwarves discovered the cavern.

name: Bag of Gold
description: %%gold%%A thank you present from a grateful person in the Crimson Isle.

name: Solved Rubix Prism
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%It took hard work and patience, but that's what love is all about!

name: Gazing Pearl
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Can be used instead of a lamp, if you enjoy living on the edge.

name: Bag of Cash
description: %%gold%%Sold to shops for 1,000,000 coins!

name: Digested Mushrooms
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Sometimes digested multiple times.

name: Magmag
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Used in love potions, and laxatives.

name: Mutated Blaze Ashes
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Blazes are ephemeral creatures, constantly consuming themselves. Their ashes are said to bring good fortune.

name: Z
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Three Dimensional

name: Titanium
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Its strength and resistance to corrosion are the highest of any metallic element.

name: Dante Ring
description: Found in a hidden warehouse. Not very useful but still pretty nice to wear.

name: Biofuel
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%100% renewable energy!

name: Bezos
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The surface is strangely cool and smooth. Often used as a ball in many sports due to its bouncy nature.

name: Jungle Key
description: %%gray%%Used to open the entrance to the Jungle Temple.

name: Mithril
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%"The Man called it "true-silver" while the Dwarves, who loved it above all things, had their own, secret name for it."

name: Y
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Two Dimensional

name: Party the Fish
description: Big fan of parties, yet its hard to enjoy them without friends.

name: Hard Stone
description: %%gray%%A condensed form of rock only found at extreme depths.

name: Divan's Alloy
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The legendary Divan explored where no other man has set foot, and came back with this incredibly rare alloy.

name: Compact Ooze
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Piglins sometimes chew on them, they can even blow bubbles out of them.

name: Spell Powder
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Looks like Sulphur, smells like Sulphur... Suspicious.

name: Volta
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Bzzzt

name: Sharp Rock
description: %%gray%%A sharp rock with sturdy construction.

name: Odger's Silver Tooth
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A perfectly fine tooth, besides a broken chunk...

name: Oil Barrel
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%100% unrenewable energy!

name: Mushroom Spore
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The life cycle of a mushroom starts with the spore, which germs and becomes Mycelium, which develops fruit bodies into a mature mushroom, and that mushroom will release spores.

name: Refined Diamond
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Looking at it for too long may cause eye trauma.

name: Flower Maelstrom
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A handcrafted bouquet made with love and some of the finest flowers around.

name: Kuudra Teeth
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Also known as mandibles.

name: Burning Eye
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Probably the single most regrettable effect of Sulphur on the island's fauna. You can't kill a spider with fire if it's already burning.

name: Yellow Rock
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%A little rough around the edges, but beauty can be found within.

name: Chunk of the Moon
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Where love is rife, the preconceived laws of physics mean nothing.

name: Pyroclastic Scale
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Makes pretty "drip" necklaces, according to the local youth.

name: X
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%One Dimensional

name: Kalhuiki Mask
description:
%%gray%%A ceremonial mask worn by the members of the Kalhuiki Tribe.

%%gray%%While wearing this mask, members of the Kalhuiki Tribe will not attack you!

name: Cup of Blood
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Eww

name: Horn of Taurus
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Popular among Piglins, often used as a war charm.

name: Basket of Hope from the Great Potato War
Thunder Shards
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Wear gloves when handling, and be cautious around water pools.

name: Flames
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Some say that the same substance can be found in the abdomen of Dragons, allowing them to breathe fire. Cinderbats are much cuter though.

name: Match-Sticks
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The head of Matchos is a combination of Sulphur and a crystalline substance. With even the slightest frictions they will light up.

name: Dark Claymore
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%That thing was too big to be called a sword, it was more like a large hunk of stone.

name: Heavy Pearl
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%It can take years for Hellwisp to create a pearl, but the Matriarch secretes so much fluid that it can make multiple of those pearls every day.

name: Leather Cloth
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The origin of that leather is a well kept secret.

name: Poorly Wrapped Rock
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Uneven, unkempt, disjointed, and that's just the guy who wrapped it!

name: Fake Emerald Altar
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Can't bring the girl to the altar? Bring the altar to the girl!

name: Enchanted Hard Stone
description: %%gray%%A refined form of heavy rock from the darkest depths.

name: Orb of Energy
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%According to Professor Selta they are 9V batteries and can supply about 50mA of current. Professor Selta is currently in a mental asylum.

name: Carnival Rod
description: %%gray%%Used to catch %%dark_aqua%%fish %%gray%%in the %%dark_aqua%%Catch a Fish %%gray%%game.

name: Kada Lead
description: %%gray%%%%italic%%The lead has to be exceedingly soft due to the nature of the mount. The chicken needs to be comfy.

name: Game Fixer
description: %%gray%%Given to individuals who broke the game too many times. Thanks for your great help!

name: Wither Soul
description: You can still hear their cries from the other side.

description: %%gray%%%%italic%%Despite being ephemeral creatures, blaze ashes are eternal.

description: It's red hot, but green and stuffed!

name: Chili Pepper
description: It's red hot, but green!

name: Hypergolic Ionized Ceramics
description:
Obtained from expired hypergolic fuel.

Travel Scroll to the Void Sepulture
Tungsten
description: %%italic%%Considered for a long time to be unbreakable prior to the discovery of the Crystal Hollows.

name: Umber
description: %%italic%%Hardy enough to flourish even in the harshest of conditions.

name: Ugly Fossil
description: The ugliest fossil to ever exist. It has a face only a mother could love.

name: Spine Fossil
description: A well-preserved set of neural spines. Whatever possessed these was an adept swimmer.

name: Clubbed Fossil
description: A tail ending in a thick club that was used to fend off predators.

name: Tusk Fossil
description: A great and powerful tusk belonging to a now-extinct creature.

name: Footprint Fossil
description: The daunting footprint of what was once a colossal and bloodthirsty predator.

name: Claw Fossil
description: A small but sharp claw once used for digging tunnels.

name: Webbed Fossil
description: The webbed foot of a small, agile creature which was a strong swimmer.

name: Secret Railroad Pass
description:
%%dark_gray%%Quest Item

%%gray%%Show this pass to the %%aqua%%Ticket Master%%gray%%.

name: Shattered Locket
description: A dainty piece of jewelry covered in a thick coat of glacite. The frosty layer obscures the details of the photograph nestled within.

name: Pendant of Divan
description: %%dark_gray%%%%italic%%An item treasured by the greatest Dwarf who ever lived. Why would he leave it behind?

name: Perfect Plate
description: %%italic%%A plate forged from an assortment of the most durable materials found in this world.

name: Glacite
description: %%italic%%An unnatural, nigh-unbreakable material. Of those unlucky few who have discovered where it originates, none have lived to tell the tale.

name: Glacite Amalgamation
description: %%italic%%Glacite resists even the heat of the great Dwarven Forge. The key is to combine rather than to try to reduce.

name: Winter Fragment
description: A magical shard capturing the warmth and joy of winter festivities.

name: Glacial Fragment
description: A small piece of a giant glacier. Doesn't ever melt.

description: %%dark_gray%%%%italic%%This toy is said to bring extraordinary luck and prosperity to its owner. But remember, with great power comes an even greater price tag.

name: Magic Top Hat
description: %%dark_gray%%%%italic%%A hat so charming, even rabbits wish to call it home.

name: Cruxmotion
description: Ultimately, it's life that is weird.

name: Exceedingly Comfy Sneakers
description: Stay classy.

name: Femurgrowth Leggings
description: %%dark_gray%%It's infected slime, it makes you slower.

name: Snake-in-a-Boot
description: You've got a friend in me.

name: Chicken Leggs
description: %%dark_gray%%Sometimes you pretend to be a dolphin, sometimes a chicken. Cluck cluck!

name: Pre-Digestion Fish
description: The obvious result of mixing cat food, spacetime bending and mystical mythology.

flex_skins.name: Duck
flex_skins.description: Fact: Ducks have a specially designed beak that allow them to filter water and mud for food while swimming.

flex_skins.name: Fox
flex_skins.description: Fact: Foxes have a unique hunting technique where they use the Earth's magnetic field to pinpoint the exact location of their prey.

flex_skins.name: Sheep
flex_skins.description: Fact: Sheeps have an excellent sense of smell and can recognize individual members of their flock by their unique scent.

flex_skins.name: Chicken
flex_skins.description: Fact: Chickens are one of the closest living relative to the Tyrannosaurus Rex.

flex_skins.name: Penguin
flex_skins.description: Fact: Penguins have a special gland above their eyes that filters salt from the seawater they ingest.

flex_skins.name: Whale
flex_skins.description: Fact: Antarctic blue whales can weigh 112,000kg (250,000lb) and still swim at 25+ km/h (18 mp/h).

flex_skins.name: Panda
flex_skins.description: Fact: Pandas have a "pseudo thumb" made of an elongated wrist bone that helps them hold bamboo stalks.

flex_skins.name: Monkey
flex_skins.description: Fact: Monkeys have been known to use their own fur as a tool to floss their teeth.

flex_skins.name: Dog
flex_skins.description: Fact: Dogs have a unique sense of smell and are even able to detect diseases like cancer and changes in blood sugar levels in people with diabetes.

flex_skins.name: Squid
flex_skins.description: Fact: Squids have the ability to change the color and texture of their skin to blend in with their surroundings, communicate with other squids and even hypnotize their prey.

flex_skins.name: Toad
flex_skins.description: Fact: Toads have glands behind their eyes that secrete bufotoxin, which can cause hallucinations, seizures and death in predators that try to eat them.

flex_skins.name: Hippo
flex_skins.description: Fact: Hippos secrete a sticky pink substance called "blood sweat" that acts as a natural sunscreen and moisturizer for their sensitive skin.

name: Ring of Broken Love
description: This time around, fate really got in the way of love.

name: Defective Monitor
description: Obtained from a Kloon who doesn't seem too stable.

name: Living Metal
description: It snakes around your blocky hand as you hold it.

name: Frozen Water
description: One could say it's... ice cold.

name: Living Metal Anchor
description:
This anchor has a life.
%%gray%%It likes music!
%%gray%%Its favorite genre?
%%gray%%Heavy metal.

%%dark_gray%%Reed needs this item.

name: Frosty Crux
description: The illest of the chillest.

name: Caducous Extract
description: Bundling what bees find attractive together in an industrial production process is definitely what nature planned.

name: Caducous Stem
description: The color and shape of flowers are a precise record of what bees find attractive.

description: It's one nether of a cap!

description: A ticking time bomb to new life. Acquired using Berberis Blowgun.

description: The animal which came right before the first chicken.

description:
Use at the old election box in the back of the HQ.

Trust no one.
Not even your own shadow.
It's always acting shady.

Thesaurus.

Contrary to popular belief, Deadgehogs aren't rodents.

They are in fact mangled wraith remnants of warriors who couldn't find true love.
